com.jidesoft.grid
Interface HierarchicalTableModel

public interface HierarchicalTableModel

HierarchicalTableModel is an interface used by HierarchicalTable to show any components in a table in a hierarchical fashion. Each row can be associated with a component. The component can be used to display detailed information of that row.

Note: This class is part of HierarchicalTable component. In current release, HierarchicalTable is still in beta. Please feel free to try it, give us suggestions and feedbacks. However we reserve the right to change the public APIs if it's necessary.

hasChildComponent

public boolean hasChildComponent(int row)
Checks if the row has child component.

Parameters:
row - the row index
Returns:
true if the row is expandable. Otherwise false.

isHierarchical

public boolean isHierarchical(int row)
Returns true if the child component will be shown in a new row. Returns false is the child component will replace the current row.

Parameters:
row -
Returns:
true if the child component will be shown in a new row. Otherwise false which means the child component will replace the current row when displaying.
